ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Follow up........
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I keep watching my guild squabble and get upset, not just over planes stuff, but ANYTHING high-level recently. And I find myself more and more content NOT
ygData.messageBody:
>Halana 50th (don't go to the planes if you dislike arguments) Shaman
>Solusek Ro

I keep watching my guild squabble and get upset, not just over planes stuff,
but ANYTHING high-level recently. And I find myself more and more content
NOT
to be involved in those levels and to be able to say "I'm not going because
I'm too little" rather than feel like I am being guilted to go on something
that
seems so little fun .

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Meara, level 14 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faerain, level 19 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 13 Meditatin' HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Phoenix, Solusek Ro
(North Ro)
